text: 9/20/[PHONE] 19:23 84 Water Pipe Leakage Sir/Madam, I, on behalf of all the public of 1st cross, I am writing this letter to you to complain about the past and present issue of water leakage from the underground pipeline of 1st cross Dead-End Road. Sir/Madam, it has been two years now, the water is seeping through the road and it causes slippery road. Due to this lot of public have sustained injures. The Water disposal system of this society has now become old and out-dated. Now, it is the time to find a permanent solution to this problem. I personally fell down twice due this water leakage on the road. I had even contacted the area water seeking help to repair this damaged pipeline. But unfortunately, he is least bothered about the issues. He himself dont have time to collect bribe from the public and always consumed with alcohol. This is a serious issue and it cannot linger anymore. The planning and maintenance department must seek a long-lasting solution. It is requested to you to repair the underground pipelines and install new manholes where necessary. Kindly take immediate note of our complaint. Thank you, Jaikiran 88 2.0 Gandhipuram, Whitefield, Bengaluru, Karnataka [PHONE], India 1st Main Road, Dead End Whitefield Bangalore 12.[PHONE] 77.[PHONE] Hagadur 23.0 Water Supply and Services Stop Water Leakage BWSSB Open 0

text: 2/28/[PHONE] 8:43 197 Irregular collection of wet waste Pourakarmikas are very irregular in collection of wet waste in our area. They don't turn up for weeks together. This results in decomposing of garbage at our houses and resulting in fly nuisance and horrible smells. Pourakarmikas are very prompt during the first week of every month during the collection of money. After which no one even bothers to come. And if they do come, they are very silent without any alerts of any sort like no Whistles or announcements. They also come during odd hours of the day. There is no fixed time for them. All in all, this has become a terrible headache for the residents of 1st main road. text: 5/19/[PHONE] 9:04 85 Pillars placed on the road to block four wheeler New connecting road is made recently between Doddanekkundi and Basavanagar. A lot of construction material has been left on the road which is causing difficulty for the commuters. Also, last week some pillars were placed on the road to block four wheelers for passing through the road. Earlier, though the road was little muddy but was being used by school buses. Now school buses have to change their route. The idea of constructing proper road to connect both area has gone in vain as now four wheelers are not able to go through it. It is causing lot of troubles especially for school buses as some of the buses are getting cancelled while some have agreed to come via doddanekkundi main road but are charging more. Request you to look upon the matter. 474 10.0 1St Main Road, Lake View Rd, Vibhutipura Extension, Doddanekundi, Doddanekkundi, Bengaluru, Karnataka [PHONE], India Doddanekkundi 12.[PHONE] 77.[PHONE] Dodda Nekkundi 15.0 Mobility - Roads, Footpaths and Infrastructure Removal Of Roadside Debris (Construction Material) BBMP Resolved 2

These builders have spoiled the entire locality by damaging the entire localities footpaths and road. However recently there has been a work carried out by BBMP and area corporator to claen the drains, repair footpaths and lay new road but the work what they have done is so bad and dirty that the cement they have used is already coming out and they have never covered the holes on the road nor have they cleared the debris. So some unknown people have started to through garbage on these debris. This locality was so beautiful before this apartment known as AJ Residency and other came. This builders have spoiled the entire look of this locality and the BBMP contractors have spoiled even more rather than fixing it and beautifying they have made even more worse. Request you all to make some difference as the complaints to local authorities and corporator have made blind eye. text: 1/26/[PHONE] 20:27 83 Road dug up for pipes but not asphalted in Channasandra The roads in the whole vicinity were dug up for laying UGD pipeline in May-June [PHONE] in the vicinity. After that the Channsandra - Immadihalli Road was dug for the same purpose. The road is full of Dust and amazing potholes. The amount of dust is so HIGH that walking on road for 100 meters will make sure your clothes have one fat layer of dust. There is no progress of work for many days and there seems no communication from BBMP about the timeline. My bike has been punctured one time due to nails dug up due to the work and dust on the road has made sure that it is very difficult for pedestrians to use the roads. text: 4/25/[PHONE] 18:10 149 Belandur Road railway underpass expansion Belandur road railway underpass is very narrow and only one vehicle can go at a time, with so many complaints for more than a year I dont see any update over there. Even the roads are pathetic there. The underpass has to be widened without any alternate solution. There can be chroma road but still the under pass allows only one vehicle. With more than [PHONE] families there I dont know the reason why there is not much of progress here. Also dont know why the BBMP is approving projects in this location if they dont have any solution to this under pass. Just getting money from the builder to build in that location I am not sure what is the use . The common people is not getting benefitted in any way. Last year it was supposed to be widened with more than a year i dont see any progress towards it. Please take it in priority or atleast stop the construction of those projects which are going or dont approve any new projects in that area till the pending works are to be completed. 84 5.0 Panathur Main Rd, Lords Steps Layout, Panathur, Bengaluru, Karnataka [PHONE], India Belandur road railway under pass 12.[PHONE] 77.[PHONE] Varthur 21.0 Traffic and Road Safety Traffic Jams/Congestion Or Bottlenecks BTP Closed 2

text: 3/29/[PHONE] 12:31 12 School is about to close due to severe ROAD condition for last two years I stay near Princetown Apartment and the road condition here in my area is worst ever. There is some pipeline work in progress for more than two years. Almost everyday contractor start digging up the road and all traffic has to divert to any other streets but those all streets have the same bad road condition issue as they have already digged-up all the street road here. Very difficult for the people who has to walk on this dirt as there is no footpath at all. Ride on your two wheels on this road has become very risky. This is the only road that goes to the schools like NPS, RR institute, Silverspring, Sunshine and many other private and government institutes. Parents have started withdrawing their child admission from these scholls only because health of their children were not well due to the dirt and bad road condition. I have been hearing that if the road issue not going to shorted out soon, schools will have to shutdown. Schools have already complained the same to the local corporators but as we all bangaloreans know they don't care. 66 10.0 Shettihalli Main Rd, Shetty Halli, Jalahalli West, Bengaluru, Karnataka [PHONE], India From Princetown apartment to NPS school 13.[PHONE] 77.[PHONE] Shettihalli 15.0 Mobility - Roads, Footpaths and Infrastructure Fixing/Reparing Potholes BBMP Re-opened 9

text: 2/23/[PHONE] 9:49 188 Overflowing manhole The manhole on the intersection of the BTM 2nd stage 7th cross road and the Bannerghatta road has been overflowing for months now. There has been no action taken in this regard to resolve the issue. On contacting the BWSSB, I have always got the same response that they haven't got permission to dig up the road to resolve the issue. This sewage water is conveniently let into the drain and this finally ends up in Madiwala lake which could be detrimental to the marine life. The sewage water ends up covering most portions of the road and with the movement of vehicles splashing the stinking water all around, the stench is unbearable. The sewage water from the overflowing manhole gets onto the road and there is an accumulation of silt which is a big accident hazard. Since this is the only main road linking 29th main Lake road to BG road, just imagine the bottleneck that would be created due to traffic when more than 50% of the road is unmotorable! When there are heavy rains, the water gets into my residence and the stinking water covers almost 6-8 inches of the entire ground floor of the house. Every time there is heavy rain, it has become a real nightmare for us to clear out the water from the house and it has already caused enough property damage. 311 2.0 115, Stage 2, Btm Layout, Bengaluru, Karnataka [PHONE], India Oneway road connecting 29th main lake road to Bannerghatta road 12.[PHONE] 77.[PHONE] Bilekahalli 472.0 Sewerage Systems Sewarage Or Storm Water Overflow BWSSB Open 0

text: 11/20/[PHONE] 17:40 192 Request for Repair of Culvert and Road Sir/madam, In front of Sri Subrahamanya matha, we have a culvert under which rain water is directed into Akshaya nagar Lake. This is the main junction from which water enters the lake. The culvert is damaged such that mud over the culvert is seeping into the drain . This is causing below issues 1. During rainy season , the area is flooded due to water blocking 2. The road laid over it is getting damaged ( very big hole connecting to bottom of the culvert) quite often causing sever accidents and also high maintenance cost for road maintenance. Request for early resolution ( Repair of culvert and road over it ) Thanking you from all residents of Akshaya nagar Shivaram Patil [PHONE] 453 10.0 5Th Cross Street Akshay Nagar, West, Akshayanagara West, Akshaya Vana, Begur, Bengaluru, Karnataka [PHONE], India Near Sri Subrahmanya Matha, Yelenahalli 12.[PHONE] 77.[PHONE] Begur 15.0 Mobility - Roads, Footpaths and Infrastructure Repair of Bridge and Culverts BBMP Open 1

text: 6-5-[PHONE] 12:16 56 Storm water drain bridge is broken The bridge built on a storm water drain is almost 18 years old, All the Chambers and parts of the bridges are broken or have big cracks. This is a grave danger for everyone, tractors and huge vehicles are constantly moving on this bridge, weakening the structure with heavy rains and covered drain holes Making it worse. This morning, a tractor's rear end went into one of the chamber, breaking the chamber and weakening the structure. It's been open and the road has been blocked since then. It smells so bad, and we realized that the drain is filled with garbage and mud and that's the reason the water flows on the bridge during heavy rainfall. The residents of our area, would want the government to take necessary action as this is the only road for more than 20 houses, if it collapses, we will have no other way to even get out of our houses. Please help us! 73 10.0 7/60, 2Nd Cross Rd, Gangappa Layout, Pai Layout, Mahadevapura, Bengaluru, Karnataka [PHONE], India Plegamma temple 12.[PHONE] 77.[PHONE] A Narayanapura 18.0 Storm Water Drains Maintenance And Repair Of Storm Water Drains BBMP Open 0

text: 6-2-[PHONE] 14:16 27 Garbage Dumping In Front of our house Dear Sir/Madam, Sub: Garbage Dumping In Front of our house Good Morning, I am resident of KalyanNagar (behind Speciality Hospital), we HAVE being complaining that people are dumping the trash in front of our house, with COVID and other virus raising their heads, we request YOU to take measures to ensure people dont throw the trash here . They come in cars, commercial vehicles and bikes to throw the trash there, when we stop them they say the garbage is already there! There is a SACK for over 2 years, when clearing the team leaves it behind under the tree, never clearing it, and the UNCIVIL people living around just come and throw the garbage there! We don't have garbage collection vehicle coming regularly to pick the trash, NEED clearance/ garbage collection vehicle regularly. The street sweepers dont sweep the garbage vehicle backs up in front of our gate littering the garbage. They come and cut all tree and plants in the name of clearing, but I wonder if they plant the trees that give us the oxygen we breath. This problem needs to be solved intelligently, the BandAid Method will not work. Need finite solutions. So some 50 house in this area are dumping the garbage in front of my house. I can help with solution but need you (BBMP) to cooperate to ensure this gets resolved. Please do the needful. Leaders MUST lead by example. Hope the commissioner is interested to lead by example. PS: We appreciate that with our continuous verbal complaints there has been clearing out multiple times sometimes, but we do need to ensure the dumping is completely stopped. We are ready to do our bit, but need the BBMP support to ensure this is done and final. NO More Dumping in front of our house. Attachment: Yes Regards Christabell Kalyannagar OMBR layout Bangalore [PHONE] 155 10.0 715, 8Th Main Rd, Hrbr Layout 1St Block, Hrbr Layout, Kalyan Nagar, Bengaluru, Karnataka [PHONE], India Behind speciality ova hospital 13.[PHONE] 77.[PHONE] Banasavadi 6.0 Garbage and Unsanitary Practices Clearance Of Garbage Dump Or Black Spot BBMP Open 1

text: 5-3-[PHONE] 11:31 85 BWSSB fails residents after collecting Kaver connectioni charges The residents and businesses, providing many jobs, are facing severe hardship due to no Kaveri water connection. Residents have been paying property taxes since [PHONE], yet we have not received any roads, or water connection. All Borewells in the layout, have gone dry and water tankers are charging exorbitant amounts to supply water. Last year the BWSSB issued notices and threatened, all residents and apartments, with blocking of sewage lines, if they did not apply and pay the charges to BWSSB for Kaveri water connection. Almost 60% owners and apartments have paid the demand charges of BWSSB. Others are waiting for BWSSB to put the Main Kaveri water line, into the layout, as they don't trust thr BWSSB, to keep their commitment. BWSSB, started the work and immediately stopped the laying of the main water line. When contacted, they are blaming the BBMP for not giving road cutting permission. This is all rubbish excuses. Even our local people representatives, are showing no concern for the hardship faced by the citizens. The situation, due to summer is now alarming. I urge our local leaders to kindly look into the matter and clear unnecessary bottlenecks, cause by people with vested interests. General Secretary SSLOA 182 2.0 Spice Garden Layout, Lakshminarayana Pura, Aecs Layout, Chinnapanna Halli, Bengaluru, Karnataka [PHONE], India Spice Garden Layout 12.[PHONE] 77.[PHONE] Dodda Nekkundi 23.0 Water Supply and Services Regular Water Supply BWSSB Open 0

text: 5/22/[PHONE] 19:13 129 Road Maintenance and repair work at Mallathahalli 1st Main Road, Bangalore Sir/Madam, Observed that Mallathahalli 1st main road needs to be repaired due to its poor state and residents finding it very difficult to use this road to reach Kengunte Circle or Old outer Ringroad (Kengeri Main Road). Residents of this ward have reported the issue to BBMP ward corporator, ward MLA and ward committee members, seems no action was taken to repair these roads from past 5 years. We request the BBMP to repair the Mallathahalli 1st Main Road immediately considering the poor condition of the road and the presence of hospital on this road. It is also observed that ward committee formed for the benefit of ward residents are not taking any action on the poor condition of roads. BBMP should ensure and maintain roads in good condition where hospitals are located making it accessible for the citizens/ occupants/ patients/ residents. Requesting BBMP to take action and to repair the road immediately. 67 10.0 33, 1St Main Rd, Mallathahalli, Bengaluru, Karnataka [PHONE], India Bhagawan Buddha Homeopathic college and hospital, Mallathahalli 12.[PHONE] 77.[PHONE] Jnana Bharathi 15.0 Mobility - Roads, Footpaths and Infrastructure Tarring Or Asphalting Of Existing Road BBMP Open 0

text: 10-12-[PHONE] 22:49 5 Belahalli turned into dumpyard of Bangalore Residents in Brigade... Belahalli turned into dumpyard of Bangalore Residents in Brigade NorthRidge, situated very close to Belahalli cross, are having horrid time because of the obnoxious smell coming from dumpyard. The situation has worsened drastically since few weeks. People are being forced to stay indoors with doors and windows closed. The obnoxious gas coming from dumpyard poses serious health hazards. Since mixed waste is getting dumped, there is a huge chance of toxins spreading into the underlying water tables which can have even serious consequences as most of Bangalore is dependent on ground water. The current need of the hour is to stop this obnoxious smell which is making life horrible for citizens. The smell is specially non tolerable near Belahalli cross, near upcoming Shobha project Dream Gardenia. 155 10.0 Unnamed Road, Agrahara Badavane, Bengaluru, Karnataka [PHONE], India 13.[PHONE] 77.[PHONE] Jakkuru 6.0 Garbage and Unsanitary Practices Clearance Of Garbage Dump Or Black Spot BBMP On-the-Job 3

text: 8-3-[PHONE] 11:39 173 Noise Pollution We have knocked on the doors of local police and also politicians but till date we have not received any positive outcome for our expressed concerns. Hope at least there shall be some action taken here. We are residents of 3rd A Cross, New Venkatapura, Koramangala 1st Block, Bangalore-[PHONE]. #309/1, Ground and 1st floor Building. This building is located in a residential place and we are the neighbours of that building. The owner of the building has rented out one of the shops to an Metal Industrial Work. Every single day we are facing lots and lots of noise pollution because of this shop from the last 6-8 months. Despite highlighting this to the local authorities nobody is bothered to take any action. isn't there a demarcation of Residential and Industrial places Sir? How are we supposed to stay at home with the loud noise of metal cutting and hammering every single day. This starts every day from morning 10:00 AM to 6:00 PM. Loud noise of Metal cutting, Metal Hammering, Welding Gas Pollution. We are not able to sit at home, our kids are not able to study, and old people are suffering every single day because of this noise & welding Gas pollution. Despite us staying in a residential area, we feel as if we are now staying in some Industrial area. with a lot of hopes we are posting our complaint here, we hope our complaint will not go unnoticed as it has gone with Police and other authorities. Building owner's name is Gangadhar and his mobile number is +91 [PHONE] [PHONE]. Building Address: #309/1, Ground and 1st floor Building, 3rd cross, 2nd Main, New Venkatapura, Koramangala 1st Block Landmark : Ashwini Hospital 46 7.0 23, 3Rd A Cross Rd, Jakkasandra, Venkatapura, Hsr Layout 5Th Sector, Bengaluru, Karnataka [PHONE], India Ashwini Hospital 12.[PHONE] 77.[PHONE] Jakkasandra 11.0 Pollution Noise Pollution KSPCB Re-opened 5

text: 12/26/[PHONE] 16:44 188 Very high and uneven footpath- difficult to use, especially for the disabled While the footpath was done last year, it is very high and uneven. For elderly people, for the disabled and people with arthritis- it is very difficult to climb on the pavement. And once we climb on to the pavement, every few feet because of shops entrance, the footpath drops by nearly 9-12 inches, so it's difficult to walk on it. Many of us prefer to walk on the road, endangering our lives. This is near Adiga's Hotel and between Adiga's Hotel and Anand Adyar Bhavan, opposite IIM Bangalore I know you have more serious problems, but if you can attend to this, I ( and all the senior citizens and disabled) would be so grateful - you could consider providing quick fix solutions- so that there is for eg, a gradient or even a lower step- at every point there is a dip, then it will not make it so impossible for us. text: 5/15/[PHONE] 15:22 188 *Water hyacinth in Madiwala lake*. As you are well aware that it'... *Water hyacinth in Madiwala lake*. As you are well aware that it's an invasive species growing rapidly and covering up the entire lake.When not controlled, water hyacinth will cover lakes and ponds entirely; this dramatically affects water flow and blocks sunlight from reaching native aquatic plants which often die. The decay processes depletes dissolved oxygen in the water, often killing fish (or turtles). The plants also create a prime habitat for mosquitos,the classic vectors of disease, and a species of snail known to host a parasitic flatworm which causes schistosomiasis (snail fever).Please take appropriate measures before it destroys the aquatic ecosystem. We the residents of area near the lake request you to take prompt and quick action to resolve the matter before it poses any threat to the residents near the lake!!!This lake is just not for beautification but life. Thanks in advance Bangaloreans and madiwala lake well 155 10.0 Blue Malibu - Nr & Aarna Projects, Virat Nagar, Bommanahalli, Bengaluru, Karnataka, India 12.[PHONE] 77.[PHONE] Bilekahalli 6.0 Garbage and Unsanitary Practices Clearance Of Garbage Dump Or Black Spot BBMP Open 0

text: 1/17/[PHONE] 13:09 187 Regular sweepers piling up the garbage Hi, the regular sweepers are piling up the street garbage (that is, the leaves that fall off from the trees) at the end of the street and neither the garbage collector nor any other auto*as claimed by the sweepers* come to collect the garbage. Despite requesting the sweepers multiple times to not pile up the garbage they continue to do so and this is causing a lot of problems. Since the road garbage is already piled up the other residents end up throwing their house garbage on the pile. We have requested them not to do so multiple times, but they still continue to throw their garbage. These Particular residents here end up burning the garbage to escape answering anyone, which causes further air pollution and health issues to other residents.This is been happening since 2-3 months now. Despite multiple requests and arguments with the garbage collector, the sweeper and those particular residents this incident continues to happen. Please take an action soon. 447 10.0 79, 2Nd Cross Rd, Phase 7, J. P. text: 4/14/[PHONE] 21:28 182 Blocked drain This is to bring to your kind information that the road drain attached to our house on the north and south sides is completely blocked. Added to this, the drainage on the other side of the road is blocked while constructing itself. Now the water flows only through the drain towards our house. The water from the Netakallapa Aquatic Center is also directed towards this drain. As a result, the water pressure is extreme and the water gushes out from the drains and back flows into our compound area and garage. We are bearing this nuisance since several years. With the onset of monsoons, it would be more difficult to manage. 10 minutes of rainfall would require hours to clean up. Several times, we have pulled up footballs that flow through the drain from the aquatic centre and block our road drains. We request you toopen the blocked drains on both sides of the road to distribute the flowing water pressure and also some measure to channeling the water from the aquatic center. Hope you will understand our misery. Awaiting for necessary action at the earliest. Leela Srinivas, W/o. P.R. SREENIVAS Resident of 3B main Road, Brindavan Layout. 343 10.0 3Rd B Main Rd, Brindavan Layout, Padmanabhanagar, Bengaluru, Karnataka [PHONE], India Two roads parallel to kumarans pu college, 3B Main Road 12.[PHONE] 77.[PHONE] Padmanabha Nagar 15.0 Mobility - Roads, Footpaths and Infrastructure Construction Of Roadside Drains BBMP Open 0

text: 8/21/[PHONE] 11:29 110 This complaint is regarding water connection to the residents of... This complaint is regarding water connection to the residents of the 110 villages. we reside in Dasarahalli near kempapura North Bangalore Area. Though all the formalities have been completed from the residents side, such as submission of application, paying of required fees, rainwater harvesting, etc. hasbeen completed. From Bwssb side they also completed all pipe lying, swewage pipe laying., water pipelying etc. for the area almost before one year. The residents are issued with RR no. and water meter connected to the house holds. The joke of the system is that BWSSB started billing the residents monthly for the metets. on repeated complaints and raising the issues for the last one year, we are still depending for the water at the mercy of the private truckers. when Cauvery is overflowing and flooding let us share these water to the needy. Big salute to BWSSB. jai Hind 42 Bangalore, Karnataka, India 12.[PHONE] 77.[PHONE] Sampangiram Nagar 9.0 Others Others Resolved 1

text: 8/19/[PHONE] 12:53 172 Encroachment due to electricity related issues There is an electric pole right in front of my home which is causing a lot of chaos. Due to this crisis situation the electricity consumption has increased drastically and due to that there are electricity related issues in the neighborhood ( we are also being affected by this). I also believe that this pole has crossed the threshold number of connections to household and it is also supplying power to a factory. Some affected people are coming for a physical fight without following social distancing and precautionary measures as they are in an assumption that since our house is closest to the pole we are involved in manipulating it and causing the trouble.We are being abused physically and mentally, today 18th August they tried to encroach into our building . KEB had confirmed in their presence that issue is caused due to high consumption and they have to fix it but they have not acted upon it. I humbly appeal to help our family in this crisis situation to resolve this dispute. 33 1.0 52, 1St Cross Rd, Tavarekere, Cashier Layout, 1St Stage, Btm Layout 1, Bengaluru, Karnataka [PHONE], India OPPOSITE TO VIGNESH HOMES 12.[PHONE] 77.[PHONE] Madivala 4.0 Electricity and Power Supply Regular Supply Of Electricity BESCOM Open 0
